title: Statue of late Minister Lakshman Kadirgamar unveiled
content: – by Janaka Alahapperuma – Pix by: Sudath Silva President Mahinda Rajapaksa unveiled a statue of the late statesman and veteran politician Lakshman Kadirgamar on his 8th Death Anniversary today (August 12) at the Lakshman Kadirgamar Institute of International Relations and Strategic Studies (LKIIRSS) in Horton Place, Colombo-07.
